More than  million was passed to provide solar rebates for homeowners and businesses . million in grants to school districts and local governments to purchase and to install solar energy systems and closer to home about  million to invest in solar development along University Avenue between Minneapolis and St PERIOD Paul and another . million to build a solar lab at the University of Minnesota PERIOD
